docs.text: " being john malkovich " is the type of film we need to see more .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: today's films are either blockbusters that entertain us with tiresome formulas , or those that have similar themes .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: malkovich falls under none of these categories , and it's quite refreshing to see that occur .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this strangely provoking story , is actually somewhat understandable .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: john cusack plays a puppeteer trying to make it to the big time .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: his wife ( cameron diaz ) supports the both of them by working at a petstore , which explains the obscure pets they keep in their apartment .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: when cusack finally realizes he needs to get a job , he finds an ad for a filing clerk .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: when he reaches the building , he arrives at a 7 1/2 floor .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's there that he discovers a secret portal that leads to being john malkovich for 15 minutes at a time .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: meanwhile , cusack meets a business partner ( catherine keener ) , in which he falls madly in love with her .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the only problem is , she has no interest in him what so ever .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the whole portal thing , isn't just a toy , in fact , it becomes cusack's dream .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: being inside malkovich's mind , gave him the opportunity to basically control mlakovich , like a puppet , and to fulfill his fantasies .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i don't want to give away too much , but cusack becomes too attached with his discovery .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in my opinion , this idea is absolutely brilliant .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's really quite scary to think that someone could become you , control you , be you .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it makes you wonder why we act like we do , and why sometimes we blurt out things or act out something out of the blue .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: even if the script is super sharp , i can't help but find the ending displeasing .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it could have lead up to something more , or at least an amusing conclusion .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it tried to explain a mythology about the portals , that made it seem rushed .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: other than that , i had a very enjoyable time .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the acting was quite delightful as well .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: john cusack has finally been given a chance to prove his ability , and he does it well .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he's by far the most underrated actor due to a lack of popularity , but i'm hoping that will change .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: cameron diaz was her usual charming self , although i felt that part was wrong for her , but she pulled it off .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: john malkovich himself continues to creep out people with his eerie facial expressions and tone of voice .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: who else's mind would be better to explore ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the director , spike jonze , who appeared in last month's three kings really catches my attention with this project .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i knew he was bizzare , but not to this extreme .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he too is likely too receive media attention .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: " being john malkovich " isn't an excellent film , but it is definitly entertaining and will eaisly become a cult favorite .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: what's even better is the film's puzzling message . . . am
